name: Ideal Pancake
description:
An unfinished game where you (a pancake) eat teddy bears that are smaller than you and get eaten by teddy bears that are larger. Also, you connect the world together by providing them electricity and Internet with you SUPERPOWER!!

Controlled by tapping (or click with mouse) on screen (jump to the direction that the rotating arrow is pointing to)

https://github.com/Sushi6006/ideal-pancake
